document.full_text: a satirical broadway show about mormons who travel from utah to uganda by the creators of "south park" scored rave reviews on friday from critics who called it the best musical comedy since "the producers."
document.title: "south park" creators score raves on broadway
lines_and_colors: a satirical broadway show about mormons who travel from utah to uganda by the creators of "south park" scored rave reviews on friday from critics who called it the best musical comedy since "the producers."
